measured_by: self-paced copying task (probability of correctly placing items)
justification: "Participants recreated an arrangement of eight items… By tracking… whether a viewed item was subsequently copied or not, we derived how viewing time and delay predicted the ability to successfully apply the encoded information."

measured_by: continuous colour report task using a colour wheel
justification: "After a delay… a colour wheel appeared and the probed location was made bold. Participants had to report the colour of the indicated item by clicking on a specific hue on the colour wheel… the dependent variable was the precision of the reports on the colour wheel."
